page.prototype: SQL::LocalDB::GetVersionInfo as P (VersionName as C, Info as SQL::LocalDBVersionInfo)

argument.name: VersionName
argument.description: The version of SQLLocalDB to get information for.

argument.name: Info
argument.description: A SQL::LocalDBVersionInfo object that will be populated with the version information.

page.description: Returns information for the specified version of SQLLocalDB. See example.
page.example:
dim VersionInfo as SQL::LocalDBVersionInfo r = SQL::LocalDB::GetVersionInfo("11.0", VersionInfo) ?r.text = "Success"
?VersionInfo = P Clone() 'Create a copy of an object instance. P NewInstance() 'Create a new object instance of the same type. Build = 5343 InstanceFilesExistOnDisk = .T. MajorVersion = 11 MinorVersion = 0 Name = "11.0.5343.0" Revision = 0 XML = <SQLLocalDBVersionInfo Type="SQL::LocalDBVersionInfo"> <Name Type="C">11.0.5343.0</Name> <InstanceFilesExistOnDisk Type="L">1</InstanceFilesExistOnDisk> <MajorVersion Type="N">11</MajorVersion> <MinorVersion Type="N">0</MinorVersion> <Build Type="N">5343</Build> <Revision Type="N">0</Revision> </SQLLocalDBVersionInfo>
